text: Robert McLendon (November 24, 1936 â€“ March 9, 2022) was an American Democrat politician. He was a member of the Arizona House of Representatives from 1983 until 2001. McLendon was born in Romney, Texas. McLendon died on March 9, 2022 in Yuma, Arizona at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Members of the Arizona Legislature Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Texas Category:Politicians from Arizona
title: Robert McLendon
